beer.name: Pyramid Haywire Hefeweizen
beer.description: The standard by which all other wheat beers are judged. Our deliciously deranged American-Style Hefeweizen is an award winning take on this Bavarian classic. This refreshingly unfiltered wheat ale delivers a distinctively smooth flavor worth sharing with friends.
beer.grains: 39% 2 Row Pale Barley, 60% Malted Wheat,1% Caramel
